texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you find yourself in the situation where you need to bulk add SPF records to every domain in Plesk, you can use this huge one-liner:
texts.text: If you find yourself in the situation where you need to bulk add SPF records to every domain in Plesk, you can use this huge one-liner:

texts.label: code
texts.orig: mysql -u admin -p`cat /etc/psa/.psa.shadow` psa -e "select dns_zone_id,displayHost from dns_recs GROUP BY dns_zone_id ORDER BY dns_zone_id ASC;" | awk '{print "INSERT INTO dns_recs (type,host,val,time_stamp,dns_zone_id,displayHost,displayVal) VALUES ('\''TXT'\'','\''"$2"'\'','\''v=spf1 a mx ~all'\'',NOW(),"$1",'\''"$2"'\'','\''v=spf1 a mx ~all'\'');"}' | mysql -u admin -p`cat /etc/psa/.psa.shadow` psa`
texts.text: mysql -u admin -p`cat /etc/psa/.psa.shadow` psa -e "select dns_zone_id,displayHost from dns_recs GROUP BY dns_zone_id ORDER BY dns_zone_id ASC;" | awk '{print "INSERT INTO dns_recs (type,host,val,time_stamp,dns_zone_id,displayHost,displayVal) VALUES ('\''TXT'\'','\''"$2"'\'','\''v=spf1 a mx ~all'\'',NOW(),"$1",'\''"$2"'\'','\''v=spf1 a mx ~all'\'');"}' | mysql -u admin -p`cat /etc/psa/.psa.shadow` psa`

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Then you'll need to make Plesk write these changes to the zone files:
texts.text: Then you'll need to make Plesk write these changes to the zone files:

texts.label: code
texts.orig: # mysql -Ns -uadmin -p`cat /etc/psa/.psa.shadow` -D psa -e 'select name from domains' | awk '{print "/usr/local/psa/admin/sbin/dnsmng update " $1 }' | sh
texts.text: # mysql -Ns -uadmin -p`cat /etc/psa/.psa.shadow` -D psa -e 'select name from domains' | awk '{print "/usr/local/psa/admin/sbin/dnsmng update " $1 }' | sh

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You can check your work by viewing the new entries you made:
texts.text: You can check your work by viewing the new entries you made:

texts.label: code
texts.orig: mysql -u admin -p`cat /etc/psa/.psa.shadow` psa -e "SELECT * FROM dns_recs WHERE type='TXT';"
texts.text: mysql -u admin -p`cat /etc/psa/.psa.shadow` psa -e "SELECT * FROM dns_recs WHERE type='TXT';"
